text: This assistant provides information only for Sunshine Hotel Singapore (the Sunshine Hotel property located in Singapore).
At Sunshine Hotel Singapore, check-in starts at 2:00 PM.
At Sunshine Hotel Singapore, check-out must be completed by 11:00 AM.
Early check-in may be requested, subject to room availability, and additional charges may apply.
Late check-out requests depend on room availability and may incur additional charges.
The front desk at Sunshine Hotel Singapore operates 24 hours a day.
Quiet hours are observed from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Guests are kindly asked to keep noise to a minimum during these hours.
You can email Sunshine Hotel Singapore at reservations@sunshinehotel.com.
You can contact Sunshine Hotel Singapore by phone at +65 6123 4567.
Sunshine Hotel Singapore is located in central Singapore. Please refer to your booking confirmation for the full address and directions.
All charges at Sunshine Hotel Singapore are billed in Singapore Dollars (SGD).
Sunshine Hotel Singapore accepts Visa, MasterCard, American Express, debit cards, and cash.
A refundable security deposit may be required at check-in to cover incidental charges. The amount and method depend on your booking and payment type.
Incidental charges (such as minibar or room service) are billed to your room and settled at check-out unless otherwise arranged.
If you need an invoice, please request it at check-out or email reservations with your booking details.
Room rates may be subject to applicable taxes and service charges. The final amount depends on your booking terms.
Contactless payments are supported where available, subject to the card issuer and terminal compatibility.
A pre-authorization hold may be placed on your card at check-in and released after check-out, depending on your bank’s processing time.
Sunshine Hotel Singapore offers Deluxe Rooms, Premier Rooms, Executive Suites, Family Suites, and selected Accessible Rooms.
Most rooms offer either a king bed or twin beds, subject to availability.
Extra beds are available upon request and may involve additional charges, subject to availability.
Connecting rooms can be requested and are subject to availability. Please contact reservations before arrival.
Complimentary baby cots are available upon request, subject to availability.
Room occupancy limits depend on the room type. Please refer to your booking confirmation for the maximum occupancy.
Smoking is strictly prohibited in non-smoking rooms and all indoor public areas. A cleaning fee may apply if smoking is detected.
An in-room safe is available in most rooms for storing valuables.
Select rooms include a minibar. Items are charged based on consumption unless otherwise stated.
Housekeeping is provided daily. If you prefer a specific time, please inform the front desk.
Towels and linens can be changed daily. To support sustainability, you may request reduced-change service.
An iron and ironing board are available upon request, subject to availability.
A hair dryer is provided in-room in most room types.
Universal power adapters may be available for loan at the front desk, subject to availability.
Complimentary (free) high-speed Wi‑Fi is available throughout the hotel at no extra charge.
Sunshine Hotel Singapore has an outdoor swimming pool with a dedicated children’s area.
A fitness center is available for in-house guests. Operating hours may vary by day.
A business corner is available with basic printing and computer access, subject to availability.
Limited parking may be available on-site or nearby. Availability and fees depend on local arrangements.
Laundry and dry-cleaning services are available for an additional charge.
Luggage storage is available before check-in and after check-out, subject to space availability.
Accessible facilities are available. Please contact the hotel in advance to confirm specific requirements.
Elevators are available for guest access to all floors.
Currency exchange services may be available nearby. The front desk can advise on the closest options.
Water refill points may be available in common areas, depending on floor and building layout.
Ice may be requested through room service or the front desk, subject to availability.
Breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM at the main restaurant.
Whether breakfast is included depends on your booking plan. Please check your confirmation or ask the front desk.
The restaurant serves a selection of local Singaporean dishes and international cuisine.
Room service may be available during selected hours. Please check the in-room menu or ask the front desk.
Halal-friendly options may be available. Please inform staff about dietary requirements.
Vegetarian options are available in the restaurant. Vegan options may be available upon request.
Please inform the hotel of any allergies. We will do our best to accommodate, but we cannot guarantee an allergen-free environment.
Late-night dining options may be limited. The front desk can recommend nearby alternatives.
A children’s menu may be available depending on the day and outlet operations.
Coffee and tea are available at the restaurant and may also be provided in-room.
Cancellation policies depend on the specific booking type. Please refer to your reservation confirmation for details.
Refunds are processed according to the applicable cancellation policy of the booking.
No-show policies vary by booking type and rate plan. Please check your booking confirmation.
Pets are generally not permitted unless explicitly stated in your booking plan or local service policy.
Guests under 18 must typically be accompanied by a parent or guardian, subject to hotel policy and local regulations.
A valid photo ID and the payment method used for booking may be required at check-in.
Guests may be charged for damages beyond normal wear and tear, in accordance with hotel policy.
Please keep noise to a reasonable level, especially during quiet hours, to ensure a comfortable stay for all guests.
Visitor access to guest rooms may be subject to registration and hotel policy. Please check with the front desk.
For guest comfort, strongly scented foods (including durian) may be restricted in guestrooms and indoor areas.
Airport transfer arrangements may be available through third-party providers. Please contact the front desk for options and pricing.
The front desk can assist with taxi bookings.
The hotel is accessible by public transport. The front desk can advise on the nearest MRT/bus options.
Sunshine Hotel Singapore is close to major shopping and dining areas. Ask the front desk for recommended attractions nearby.
If you expect to arrive late, please inform the hotel to help secure your reservation and check-in arrangements.
The hotel has 24-hour security measures and controlled access to guest floors.
Emergency exits and procedures are posted on each floor. Please review the information behind your room door.
If you require medical assistance, contact the front desk immediately. They can help arrange local services.
For lost-and-found inquiries, contact the front desk with as much detail as possible.
Wi‑Fi password / login details are provided at check‑in or displayed in your room. If you need the Wi‑Fi password, please contact the front desk.
Hotel Wi‑Fi speed varies by location and usage. Complimentary high‑speed Wi‑Fi is provided; contact the front desk if you experience slow Wi‑Fi.
Wired internet may not be available in all rooms. Please check with the front desk if you require a wired connection.
If you place the 'Do Not Disturb' sign, housekeeping will not enter unless required for safety or policy reasons.
Extra towels can be requested from housekeeping or the front desk, subject to availability.
Additional pillows may be requested, subject to availability.
Turn-down service may be available for certain room categories or upon request.
Family-friendly amenities may be available. Please ask the front desk for current offerings and availability.
Stroller storage can often be accommodated. Please contact the front desk for assistance.
High chairs may be available in the restaurant, subject to availability.
Meeting rooms may be available for corporate or private functions. Please contact the hotel for capacity and rates.
For wedding and event inquiries, please email reservations with your preferred dates and requirements.
Banquet and catering options may be available. Availability depends on event schedule and staffing.
Basic toiletries are provided. Additional items may be available upon request, subject to stock.
Slippers are provided in most rooms, or can be requested from housekeeping.
Bathrobes may be available in selected room types. Please contact the front desk if you need one.
Charging cables may be available for loan at the front desk, subject to availability.
Wheelchair access is available in common areas. Please contact us in advance to confirm room accessibility features.
If you need hearing-assistance features, please inform the hotel in advance so we can advise availability.
Service animals may be accommodated in accordance with local guidance. Please contact the hotel to confirm.
Sunshine Hotel supports sustainability initiatives such as towel/linen reuse and energy-efficient operations.
For group bookings, please contact reservations with dates, room count, and any special requirements.
Rates can vary by date and availability. The hotel cannot guarantee a rate change unless stated in your booking terms.
To extend your stay, please contact the front desk early to check availability and confirm rates.
The front desk can help with directions to airport, including public transport and taxi options.
The front desk can help with directions to city, including public transport and taxi options.
The front desk can help with directions to island, including public transport and taxi options.
The front desk can help with directions to Night Safari, including public transport and taxi options.
The front desk can help with directions to Singapore Zoo, including public transport and taxi options.
The front desk can help with directions to Gardens by the Bay, including public transport and taxi options.
The front desk can help with directions to Sentosa, including public transport and taxi options.
For local Singaporean food (e.g., hawker centres, chilli crab), ask the front desk for nearby recommendations.
For Chinese food (e.g., dim sum, noodles), ask the front desk for nearby restaurant recommendations.
For Indian food (e.g., curry, biryani, tandoori), ask the front desk for nearby restaurant recommendations.
For Western food (e.g., steak, pasta), ask the front desk for nearby restaurant recommendations.
For Japanese food (e.g., sushi, ramen), ask the front desk for nearby restaurant recommendations.
For Thai food (e.g., tom yum, pad thai), ask the front desk for nearby restaurant recommendations.
Swimming pool operating hours may vary. Please check the signage at the pool or confirm with the front desk.
Pool towels may be provided at the pool area or can be requested. Please return towels after use.
Fitness center access may be restricted for minors. Please check with the front desk for the current policy.
The front desk can advise on the nearest pharmacy and the best way to get there.
The front desk can advise on the nearest clinic and the best way to get there.
The front desk can advise on the nearest ATM and the best way to get there.
The front desk can advise on the nearest supermarket and the best way to get there.
The front desk can advise on the nearest laundromat and the best way to get there.
The front desk can advise on the nearest post office and the best way to get there.
Basic printing may be available at the front desk or business corner, subject to availability and policy.
Small parcels may be received for in-house guests. Please label items clearly with your name and arrival date.
Wake-up call service is available. Please request it via the front desk.
Late-night check-in is available. Please inform the hotel if you expect to arrive after midnight.
Guest information is handled according to applicable privacy requirements. Please contact the hotel for formal privacy policy details.
CCTV may be used in public areas for safety and security purposes.
Toothbrush kits may be provided on request. Please contact the front desk or housekeeping.
Shaving kits may be provided on request. Please contact the front desk or housekeeping.
A sewing kit may be available on request. Please contact the front desk or housekeeping.
Shower caps may be available on request. Please contact the front desk or housekeeping.
Earplugs may be available on request, subject to stock. Please contact the front desk or housekeeping.
Umbrellas may be available for loan during rainy weather, subject to availability. Please contact the front desk or housekeeping.
Complimentary water may be provided daily, depending on room type and policy. Please contact the front desk or housekeeping.
If a payment issue occurs, the front desk will contact you to resolve it promptly.
If you lose your key card, please visit the front desk for a replacement. Identity verification may be required.
Non-refundable bookings generally cannot be refunded. Please refer to your booking terms for details.
For bookings made through third-party platforms, some changes may need to be processed through the platform.
Air conditioning is available in guestrooms. If you need assistance adjusting it, please contact the front desk.
Most rooms include a TV with local and selected international channels.
Streaming availability depends on the room TV system. You may use your own device where supported.
USB charging ports may be available in some rooms; otherwise, standard power outlets can be used.
Blackout curtains are available in most guestrooms.
Rooms are designed for comfort; however, noise levels can vary. Earplugs may be requested if needed.
The front desk can assist with basic tour information and recommendations.
Car rental arrangements can be made through third-party providers; please contact the front desk.
Babysitting services may not be available at all times; please check with the front desk.
In-room massage services may be available through third-party providers; availability may vary.
Please bring a valid photo ID and the payment method used for booking (or a guarantee method), as these may be required at check-in.
If approved, late check-out may incur a fee depending on the requested time and occupancy. Please confirm with the front desk on the day.
If approved, early check-in may incur a fee depending on arrival time and availability. Please confirm with the front desk on arrival.
Special requests (such as high floor or away from elevators) are subject to availability and cannot be guaranteed.
